arts.ttl: Cologne stroll to victory over Freiburg
arts.sum: Marius Bülter delivered a match-winning performance with a goal and two assists as Cologne defeated Freiburg 4-1 to make it two wins from two in the Bundesliga since their return. The moment Marius Bülter doubles Köln's lead with a well-placed header past Noah Atubolu, giving the home side a commanding position early in the second half.
